press.body: MAGI featured in News from Brown: Web app helps researchers explore cancer genetics.
HotNet2 featured in News from Brown: Algorithm identifies networks of genetic changes across cancers.
Our acute myeloid leukemia analysis with Dendrix++ (part of the TCGA AML paper) is featured in News from Brown: Algorithms find genetic cancer networks.
The TCGA acute myeloid leukemia project is discussed in The New York Times.
